scripts.mysql: docker exec -it fantasy_mysql mysql -u root -proot fantasy_baseball
scripts.sync:all: docker exec pybaseball python main.py all
scripts.sync:game_logs: docker exec pybaseball python main.py game_logs
scripts.sync:compute_stats: docker exec pybaseball python main.py compute_stats
scripts.sync:probable_pitchers: docker exec pybaseball python main.py probable_pitchers
scripts.sync:season_stats: docker exec pybaseball python main.py season_stats
